description: To create UGA files, select File → Save As , choose your save location, name your file, and save in the UGA format.
In the trial version of GIF Animator 5, sample UGA files can be found in the following directory C:\​Program Files (x86)\​Ulead Systems\​Ulead GIF Animator 5 Trial\​Samples .
NOTE: Ulead was acquired by Corel in 2006 and the GIF Animator tool was discontinued.
